text: Hello! I am new to the HubSpot CMS and hoping to get started on using it more in the upcoming months. I wanted to know if there is a possibility to practice on a child/unpublished website while I am learning to use the cms as I do not want to tamper with our published pages.

Yep! that’s what our sandboxes are for:
<https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>
They’re a safe space to learn and try new things withouat affecting a production HubSpot account.
